news_header: Debate over renaming Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America reflects political tensions and local opinions in Texas.
news_original_title: Trump haluaa poistaa Meksikonlahden maailmankartoilta, mutta Texasissa kielipoliisi kohtaa myös vastarintaa
news_text: In Texas, locals express mixed feelings about renaming the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America, a concept popularized by comedian Stephen Colbert and supported by some politicians. The name change symbolizes political tensions, with President Trump opposing the Gulf of Mexico designation. While some locals embrace the new name, others dismiss it as trivial amidst larger issues.
